formulas.title: Quadratic Formula
formulas.description: Solves quadratic equations of form ax²+bx+c=0

formulas.title: Distance Formula
formulas.description: Distance between two points in coordinate plane

formulas.title: Slope Formula
formulas.description: Slope of a line through two points

formulas.title: Geometric Mean
formulas.description: Geometric mean of n positive numbers

formulas.title: Factoring Difference of Squares
formulas.description: Factoring formula for difference of squares

formulas.title: Factoring Sum of Cubes
formulas.description: Factoring formula for sum of cubes

formulas.title: Factoring Difference of Cubes
formulas.description: Factoring formula for difference of cubes

formulas.title: Infinite Geometric Series
formulas.description: Sum of infinite geometric series when |r|<1

formulas.title: Pythagorean Theorem
formulas.description: Relationship between sides of right triangle

formulas.title: Heron's Formula
formulas.description: Area of triangle using Heron's formula

formulas.title: Newton's First Law
formulas.description: Object at rest stays at rest

formulas.title: Moment of Inertia - Point Mass
formulas.description: Moment of inertia for point mass

formulas.title: Ohm's Law
formulas.description: Relationship between voltage, current, and resistance

formulas.title: Electric Potential
formulas.description: Electric potential due to point charge

formulas.title: Magnetic Force
formulas.description: Force on charged particle in magnetic field

formulas.title: Factor Theorem
formulas.latex: If P(a)=0, then (x-a) is a factor

formulas.title: Rational Root Theorem
formulas.latex: Possible rational roots are factors of constant/leading coefficient

formulas.title: Area of Scalene Triangle
formulas.description: Area using two sides and included angle

formulas.title: Guldinus Theorem
formulas.description: Surface area of solid of revolution

formulas.title: Squeeze Theorem
formulas.latex: If g(x)\leq f(x)\leq h(x) and \lim g=\lim h=L, then \lim f=L

formulas.title: Intermediate Value Theorem
formulas.latex: If f continuous on [a,b] and k between f(a) and f(b), then f(c)=k

formulas.title: Extreme Value Theorem
formulas.latex: Continuous function on [a,b] attains max and min

formulas.title: Rolle's Theorem
formulas.latex: If f(a)=f(b) and f differentiable, then f'(c)=0

formulas.title: First Derivative Test
formulas.latex: Sign change of f' indicates local extrema

formulas.title: Second Derivative Test
formulas.latex: f''(c)>0 implies local min, f''(c)<0 implies local max

formulas.title: Concavity
formulas.latex: f''(x)>0 implies concave up, f''(x)<0 implies concave down

formulas.title: Optimization
formulas.latex: Find max/min of function subject to constraints

formulas.title: Kepler's Third Law
formulas.description: Period squared proportional to semi-major axis cubed

formulas.title: Electric Field - Ring
formulas.description: Electric field on axis of ring

formulas.title: Magnetic Field - Loop
formulas.description: Magnetic field at center of loop

formulas.title: Huygens' Principle
formulas.latex: Every point on wavefront is source of spherical waves

formulas.title: Fermat's Principle
formulas.latex: Light takes path of least time
